titles.title: Southern Arizona Public Lands Protection Act of 2011
To withdraw certain Federal lands and interests located in Pima and Santa Cruz counties, Arizona, from the mining and mineral leasing laws of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
